title: WTB - N28 baeball beaters, anyone have?
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: WTB - N28 baeball beaters, anyone have?
posts.post_content:
I'd like to out together a couple really low grade N28 baseball sets.

Anyone have any beaters to sell?  I have a ton of OJ beaters that I would be willing to trade as well.
